message.content:
cs.SE, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.HC. 

The paper discusses an approach for automatically detailing scenario descriptions for execution in a simulation environment, which involves transforming linguistic descriptions into a parameter space representation and converting them into data formats required by the simulation environment. This process involves aspects of software engineering (cs.SE), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), robotics (cs.RO), systems and control (cs.SY), and human-computer interaction (cs.HC) as it aims to improve the efficiency and consistency of scenario generation and testing for automated driving functions.
